# Apple Dumplings

## Ingredients

* 1 cup water
* 1/8 tsp cinnamon
* 1/8 tsp nutmet
* 2 Tbl butter
* 6 apples, paired and cored
* 2 cups flour
* 2 tsp baking powder
* 2.3 cups margarine
* 0.5 cups milk
* 1 tsp salt

## Instructions

Combine the water, cinnamon, nutmeg, and butter and bring it to a boil.

Sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Cut in the margarine. Add milk and stir until moistened. Roll to 0.25 inch thick and cut into 6 squares. Place an aple in the center of each square, sprinkle with a mixture of sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. Dot with butter. Fold corners of the pastry to the center and pinch the edges together. Place 1 inch apart in a greased 11x7x1.5 inch baking dish. Pour syrup over dumplings, sprinkle with sugar. Baker at 375&deg;F for 35 minutes.
